summary: A Siamese twin kills the husband who left her. The courts have to decide if she is convicted of murder, how can they punish her sister, who had nothing to do with the crime?
cast: Violet Hilton|Daisy Hilton|Mario Laval|Allen Jenkins|Patricia Wright|Alan Keys|Norval Mitchell|Edna Holland|Brian O'Hara|Herbert Lytton|Jack Mulhall|James Hope|Roy Regnier|Zena Barry|Tony Iavello|Whitey Roberts|Paul Gordon|Jack Daly|Gil Frye|Michael Mark|Harold Miller|Suzanne Ridgway|Cosmo Sardo|Jeffrey Sayre
title: Chained for Life
